description: React functional component 'Board' that renders a 3x3 grid of 'Square' components for a Tic Tac Toe game. It manages rendering of the grid, passing props to each Square, including click handling and accessibility labels.

methods.name: Board({ squares, onSquareClick, disabled })
methods.description: React functional component that displays the game board with squares, handling click events and disabled state.
